description: Request for approval under Schedule 17 to the High-Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017 for the creation of five gravel islands in the south-eastern corner of Broadwater Lake within the Colne Valley to provide nesting opportunities for water birds.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: COLNE VALLEY VIADUCT, WETLANDS ECOLOGICAL MITIGATION SITE
decision_conditions: The impact on the local environment, amenity, road safety, traffic, archaeology, historic interest and nature conservation has been considered within the main body of the report. It is concluded that the design and external appearance of the works are acceptable. It is not considered that the design and external appearance of the works ought to be modified and it is recommended that the application be approved, in accordance with Schedule 17, Part 1, Paragraphs 2 and 3, of the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017.
